name: Ice Hockey Champs
description:
Perform a memorable hat-trick in this special edition of Flick Champions Winter Sport!
Set up your team on the shiny ice and put the puck into your opponent's gate, hit after hit! Or maybe it will be your players to be taken on stretchers??


FEATURES:
► INSTANT PICK-UP AND PLAY, with easy to master controls
► Real-time, cross-platform Hockey match!
► Individual or 2-Player mode
► Unique graphics style
► Global Ranking of the best (and worst!) Hokeists!
► Lightweight, smooth and User-friendly


Stay tuned for more online multiplayer sporting events, powered by Flick Champions ™!
